item.title: 尼日利亚将发行 5 亿美元美元证券
item.description: 尼日利亚财政部长瓦莱-埃顿（Wale Edun）表示，尼日利亚政府计划在国内市场出售 5 亿美元的美元证券，以吸引居住在国外的尼日利亚公民持有的外汇。【原文：Nigeria’s government plans to sell $500 million of dollar-denominated securities in the domestic market to attract foreign currency held by its citizens living abroad, Finance Minister Wale Edun said.】

item.title: 据说 CATL 供应商洛帕尔公司将为印度尼西亚分公司寻求 2 亿美元的投资
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，江苏洛铂科技股份有限公司正在考虑为其印尼子公司融资约2亿美元，因为该公司正在当地加强电动汽车电池所用材料的生产。【原文：Jiangsu Lopal Tech Co. is considering raising about $200 million for its Indonesian unit as it ramps up local production of materials used in electric-vehicle batteries, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 阿波罗将在最新英国包裹交易中从竞争对手 Advent 手中收购 Evri
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. has agreed to buy parcel delivery company Evri Ltd from private equity rival Advent International, the latest UK deal in a sector that’s been spurred on by the e-commerce boom.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织计划下周召开董事会讨论埃塞俄比亚新贷款计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）执行董事会定于下周召开会议，讨论埃塞俄比亚提出的新基金支持计划申请。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board of directors is scheduled to meet next week over Ethiopia’s request for a new fund-supported program, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省野火肆虐加拿大落基山脉贾斯珀镇
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省的一场野火迅速蔓延，席卷了度假胜地贾斯珀，摧毁了这个风景优美的社区的建筑。【原文：A fast-moving wildfire in Alberta has ripped through the resort town of Jasper, destroying buildings in the scenic community that had been evacuated earlier in this week as the blaze approached.】

item.title: 高盛向 1,290 亿美元的地方政府 ETF 市场下更大赌注
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）将推出四只新的市政债券交易所交易基金，为价值 1,290 亿美元的州和地方政府债务市场再添一角。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management is launching four new municipal-bond exchange-traded funds, adding to the $129 billion corner of the state and local government debt market.】

item.title: 津巴布韦宣布采取措施刺激对 ZiG 货币的需求
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）宣布了一些措施，以帮助刺激对该国金银支持货币的需求，政府部门将接受用当地货币支付商品和服务费用。【原文：Zimbabwean Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube announced measures to help spur demand for the nation’s bullion-backed currency, with government departments set to accept payment for goods and services in the local currency.】

item.title: 汤姆-海耶斯就利差交易定罪获得英国最高法院上诉机会
item.description: 汤姆-海耶斯（Tom Hayes）是前明星交易员，也是 Libor 丑闻的代言人，英国最高法院允许他对近十年的刑事定罪提出上诉。【原文：Tom Hayes, the former star trader who became the face of the Libor scandal, was granted permission by the UK’s highest court to appeal his near decade-old criminal conviction.】

item.title: KKR 同意以 48 亿美元收购软件公司 Instructure
item.description: KKR & Co.已同意收购教育软件商Instructure Holdings Inc.【原文：KKR & Co. has agreed to acquire educational software provider Instructure Holdings Inc.】

item.title: 葡萄牙拉波索表示欧洲央行今年可能再降息两次
item.description: 葡萄牙银行副行长克拉拉-拉波索（Clara Raposo）表示，如果物价压力的放缓符合预期，欧洲中央银行今年很可能会再降低两次存款利率。【原文：The European Central Bank will probably be able to lower its deposit rate twice more this year provided price pressures slow in line with expectations, according to Clara Raposo, vice governor of the Bank of Portugal.】

item.title: 泰晤士股东 USS 称亏损可能影响未来英国投资
item.description: 泰晤士河水务公司的第二大股东和英国关键基础设施的最大投资者之一警告说，在这家陷入困境的公用事业公司出现亏损后，它将重新考虑未来对其他受监管资产的资助。【原文：Thames Water’s second-largest shareholder and one of the UK’s biggest investors in key infrastructure warned that it will reconsider its future funding for other regulated assets following losses at the beleaguered utility.】

item.title: 借贷前景堪忧，空头大举押注加拿大银行
item.description: 由于经济仍在苦苦挣扎，抵押贷款和其他贷款出现坏账的风险上升，交易商们正在对加拿大最大的银行下注。【原文：Traders are betting against Canada’s biggest banks as the risk of mortgages and other loans going bad rises with the economy still struggling.】

item.description: 美国股市的大幅反弹正显示出摇摇欲坠的迹象，而策略师们则表示，加拿大股市已经准备好领先。【原文：The dramatic rally in US stocks is showing signs of faltering while strategists say Canadian equities are ready to pull ahead.】

item.title: 迈阿密公寓吸引墨西哥富人海外置业
item.description: 最近的一个上午，十多位富裕的潜在投资者聚集在墨西哥城繁华的波澜科区总统洲际酒店。他们是来听迈阿密房地产推介的，其中许多人是被报纸上一则两页的广告所吸引，该广告吹嘘迈阿密的公寓设施豪华，起价 50 万美元。【原文：More than a dozen well-heeled prospective investors gathered at the Presidente InterContinental hotel in Mexico City’s ritzy Polanco neighborhood on a recent morning. They were there to hear a pitch on Miami real estate, many of them lured by a two-page newspaper ad touting luxury amenities in condos starting at $500,000.】

item.title: 科技股大跌恐使首次公开募股更难卖出
item.description: 对于华尔街的投资银行家来说，近两年来科技股最严重的抛售有可能使一个痛苦的现实更加恶化：投资者并不热衷于参与该行业的下一次大型 IPO。【原文：For Wall Street’s investment bankers, the deepest tech-stock selloff in nearly two years is threatening to worsen a painful reality: Investors just aren’t clamoring to get in on the industry’s next big IPO.】

item.title: 法国限制电力出口可能会提高邻国的电价
item.description: 从下周一开始，法国电网的限制将在两个多月内制约电力出口，从而威胁到周边国家的电价上涨。【原文：French electricity grid limitations will constrain power exports from Monday for more than two months, threatening higher prices in neighboring countries.】

item.title: 贝瓦投资者代表表示支持濒临破产的公司
item.description: BayWa AG 最大投资者的一位重要代表表示，愿意支持这家债务负担沉重的德国大宗商品贸易商。【原文：A key representative for the biggest investor in BayWa AG signaled willingness to support the German commodities trader that’s burdened by a big debt load.】

item.title: 皇家加勒比停发四年股息后重新开始分红
item.description: 皇家加勒比游轮有限公司（Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd.）成为首家恢复分红的游轮运营商，因为创纪录的需求使其财务状况更加稳固。【原文：Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd. became the first cruise operator to reinstate dividends as record demand put it on firmer financial footing.】

item.title: 纳格尔称，若数据保持不变，欧洲央行应能降息
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，如果经济数据没有带来负面惊喜，欧洲央行应该能够降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank should be able to lower borrowing costs if economic data don’t deliver a negative surprise, according to Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 亚马逊不断膨胀的现金堆为分红创造了条件
item.description: 亚马逊公司今年的现金囤积预计将超过 1000 亿美元，这对于亚马逊公司与其他巨型公司一起向股东返还现金，包括可能打破股息封印来说，是前所未有的有利条件。【原文：With a cash hoard that’s expected to top $100 billion this year, conditions have never been more favorable for Amazon.com Inc. join its megacap peers in returning cash to shareholders, including by potentially breaking the seal on a dividend.】

item.title: 通胀加速，乌克兰结束连续降息
item.description: 乌克兰停止了连续三次降息，因为通胀加速促使政策制定者发出了明年才可能恢复宽松政策的信号。【原文：Ukraine halted a run of three interest-rate cuts as an acceleration in inflation prompted policymakers to signal that easing may only be resumed next year.】

item.title: 美国公司在中国受到热烈欢迎，但不确定是否被需要
item.description: 本周访华的美国高管有机会与习近平主席的政府高级官员会面，但在中国政府对外国投资的开放态度上，他们收到了相互矛盾的信号。【原文：US executives who visited China this week got the chance to meet with senior officials of President Xi Jinping’s government, but received conflicting signals over Beijing’s openness to foreign investment.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗下电力公司计划出售 5.97 亿美元股票
item.description: 高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的输电部门正在考虑通过出售股票筹集至少 500 亿卢比（约合 5.97 亿美元）的资金，这也是这家印度企业集团自被做空者的一份严厉报告抹去数十亿股东价值后首次进军公开股票市场。【原文：Gautam Adani’s power transmission unit is considering raising at least 50 billion rupees ($597 million) through a share sale, making the Indian conglomerate’s first foray into public equity markets since a scathing short-seller’s report wiped away billions in shareholder value.】

item.title: 迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨的银河公司为新的加密风险基金融资 1.13 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）的银河资产管理公司（Galaxy Asset Management）为一支风险基金筹集了 1.13 亿美元，该基金主要投资于加密软件、基础设施和金融应用领域的早期初创企业。【原文：Billionaire Michael Novogratz’s Galaxy Asset Management unit has raised $113 million for a venture fund investing in early-stage startups focused on crypto software, infrastructure and financial applications.】
